body: I have commented out the validations for kind attribute in team model, because I'm not sure if this kind field should be changed by a team member or organizer. The validation has been commented out for now, because this kicks in when an admin sets a team as selected and therefore does not let the admin save the form. If this has to be commented out, then the admin must take the responsibility of setting this field for a team. Not sure if this is what the admins of this application want, so I have commented it out.
